markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bounce Back](/Feats.aspx?ID=1441) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You lose the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition.

</column>

---

You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience. Don't increase the value of your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition due to losing the dying condition.
name: Bounce Back
